answers.answer: You might just have the gest diabetes. No big stress and totally manageable. I know I already have it even though im 22w and up 18kgs because I had a hypo at about 13w. And have consistently low sugar until about 18 and then its been borderline high. Anyway try not to worry, it won't affect you too much. Just possibly less fruit and sugar
I am on number 5 and stoll, have questions. Lol they could just, be letting u know all is ok.  I have done this a  few times
It was just a call to say my iron is really low, which my doc already told me. Thanks for the support mommies.

question: I'm 27wks 4ds. I gained 35lbs and measured 3 inches bigger than normal. I took a 3 hour glucose test and all was good about 2 months ago. Took an hour glucose test today and was called back by the nurse. When I called in, the office was closed. I'm so scared because I have braxton hicks everyday for the past 3 days.
title: 4th baby but still have questions.
